text: the fundamental tenets of the christian
faith
well one of the pastors on our staff and
i wrote a series on that called
foundations 11 essential truths to build
your life on
but as i understand it the basic tenet
of the christian faith is that god is
the creator
of it all he's the sustainer of it all
that he loves every person he's ever
made
he
is passionately in love with every
person he's ever made and longs to be in
relationship with him
i believe that as i the bible is my
authority for my life and in that i'm
told that jesus is the savior that every
person needs a savior that we're all
separated from god by our own personal
heart of sinfulness and rebellion and
that we can't fix it on our own that we
need a savior so the basic tenets are
that god is the creator and sustainer of
it all he sent his son jesus to be the
savior for all of the world and that he
sent the holy spirit to be our comforter
and our friend and then that the bible
is is our main authority i think if i
had to summarize like the four top
truths about the christian faith it
would probably be those four things
